title: RBI slashes repo rate by 0.5% to boost growth
description: In a bid to spur growth at a time when inflation has come under control, the Reserve Bank of India’s Monetary Policy Committee on Friday (June 6, 2025) voted 5:1 to slash the policy repo rate by a bigger-than-expected 50 basis points to 5.50% with immediate effect. This is the RBI’s third repo rate ...
